title: I get a Application failed to start 0x000007b error
body:
Hi there.

I log in just fine and get to champion selection like everyone else, but as soon it loads up the game it crashes.

"League of Legends.exe - Application Error"
The application was unable to start correctly(0xc000007b). Click OK to close the application.


The last couple of days i have been trying to fix this error but i cant seem to find a solution.

1. I have tried installing all the C++ packages.
2. Updating Graphic drivers
3. Updating, and reinstalling directx 9 and directx 11
4. Updating some dll files from my friends computer where it works.
5. Microsoft Fix It for dll files
6. LoL Repair.
7. Reinstall.
8. Copy the entire game from a friend.

I gotten to a point where im run out of ideas, hopefully somone can help me.

Thanks !

replies.body:
>4. Updating some dll files from my friends computer where it works.

That's ill-advised. Yes, it's tempting to just *put* the files where they belong, but that bypasses editing the registry, so even though you have the file, you don't have access to it. Also, it's not the correct author and the file doesn't have right permissions/associations.

You've done a reinstall, during which it would install DirectX for you. If you had any problems with DirectX, it would have happened then. Strange that it didn't.

What graphics card do you have?
